text: (manatil nattaminri, poy illamal atikkati ninkal ceyyum) vinana cattiyankalukkaka allah unkalai kurram pitippatillai. Anal, unkal ullankal (urutiyutan) ceyyum cattiyankalukkaka, (atai ninkal niraiverravillaiyayin) avan unkalai kurram pitippan. Allah (kurrankalai) mikka mannippavan, atikam porumai utaiyavan avan
